abstract: There were deals like an $11 kayak and a $9 projector, and while Walmart blamed a technical error, it did not say whether it would honor the deals.
snippet: There were deals like an $11 kayak and a $9 projector, and while Walmart blamed a technical error, it did not say whether it would honor the deals.
lead_paragraph: First, there was Black Friday. Then came Cyber Monday.

headline.main: Error Creates Deals Too Good to Be True on Walmart’s Site
headline.print_headline: Error Creates Deals Too Good to Be True on Walmart’s Site
